question: Who was the next British Prime Minister after Arthur Balfour?

cot.cot_output:

Arthur Balfour served as the British Prime Minister from 1902 to 1905. The next Prime Minister after Balfour was Sir Henry Campbell-Bannerman, who served from 1905 to 1908.

Sir Henry Campbell-Bannerman
